caption.p: Binding regions of ASIC3 Modulators. Proven (co-crystal structures and mutagenesis) and suspected (in silico) binding of agonists (a) and antagonists (b) to the rASIC3 binding regions. The homology model of rASIC3 was built using the published crystal structure of cASIC1a as template (PDB: 2QTS, PMID: 17,882,215); for details of rASIC3 modeling see [ 200]
